DESCRIPTIONS: A gremlin is madly shuffling cards on a table. This monster seems to be a harmless one. You approach him out of curiosity.
" #bCombine two cards and get a more powerful card! NL Are you ready? Let's start!"
You complete the gremlin's game and look up. NL He disappeared? NL In front of you is a card same as you just played.
You take the card and continue the journey.
You don't trust the gremlin and leave without taking the card.

chaofanmod:event.GrimlinMiner.NAME: Miner
DESCRIPTIONS: A gremlin sees you passing by and waves to you: "Come on! Come on! There's a chance to #ymake #ymoney! Come and take a look!" NL This monster seems to be a harmless one. You approach him out of curiosity.
"This is what I found. You have to pay #ygold first! Whatever you get, it's yours! NL "The time limit is 60 seconds. Are you ready... #r@Start!@ "
You take your #yharvest and continue the journey.
You don't trust the gremlin and leave.
